## ChatHeadless.report() method

Send Chat related analytics event to Yext Analytics API.

**Signature:**

```typescript
report(eventPayload: Omit<EventPayload, "chat"> & DeepPartial<Pick<EventPayload, "chat">>): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventPayload | Omit&lt;EventPayload, "chat"&gt; &amp; DeepPartial&lt;Pick&lt;EventPayload, "chat"&gt;&gt; |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

once a CHAT\_IMPRESSION analytics event is reported, subsequent CHAT\_IMPRESSION reports will not be send.
